data.title: Kafka Banner Rerun Countdown
data.meta_description: Kafka arrives in Honkai Star Rail on August 9th, know when she released in your timezone. Save your crystals!
data.text:
Kafka is almost here again! We know you’re just as eager to warp on Kafka as we are, so there is no need to keep looking at the clock for when he releases. Just stick around and use our Kafka banner rerun countdown for Honkai Star Rail.

If you’re wondering when the next big gaming release, event, or reset will happen, head to our Game Countdowns page to stay in the loop! Also, keep an eye on our Honkai Star Rail Codes page for some free goodies.

Honkai Star Rail Kafka Banner Rerun Release Time Countdown

For those of you eagerly awaiting the Kafka Banner Rerun ‘Nessun Dorma’ in Honkai Star Rail 1.6, circle the date: January 16th or 17th, depending on your time zone. Once that countdown hits zero, you’re set to warp for Kafka in Honkai Star Rail.

Kafka Banner Countdown for America Servers

The Kafka Banner is now available in America!

Kafka Banner Countdown for Europe Servers

The Kafka Banner is now available in Europe!

Kafka Banner Countdown for Asia Servers

The Kafka Banner is now available in Asia!

Related: Honkai Star Rail Codes [New HSR] – Free Stellar Jade & Credits!

Kafka Banner Gacha Rates in Honkai Star Rail

Who Are the Four-Star Characters in Kafka’s Banner in HSR?

These are the Four-Star characters you can also get the chance of getting in Kafka’s Banner in HSR 1.6 phase 2:

Sushang

Natasha

Hook

Sushang

Sushang (Physical/Hunt) excels as an S-tier character in delivering Physical damage against individual targets. Her Skill damage sees a notable increase when targeting enemies with a Weakness Broken status, making her most effective when teamed up with units that can establish that condition.

Natasha

Natasha, aligns with the physical-element Abundance category. She excels in healing her team members through her Abundance path-based restoration skills. Her proficiency in healing makes her a crucial asset in challenging levels of the game. Players can access Natasha without any cost in the early stages of the game.

Hook

Hook’s strategy revolves around inflicting burn damage on enemies, followed by leveraging this weakened state. Her ultimate ability not only inflicts significant damage but also enhances her skills for even more impactful attacks. If your team already includes a fire character capable of consistently causing Burn, Hook is an advantageous addition to your roster.
